game.description: &fRide on a supersonic sheep and eliminate all your opponents by cutting their way. Pick up power-ups on the map to survive and ot make it harder for other players.
power-up.speed.description:
&7Increases the speed of your sheep
&7to go faster! &8(5s)
power-up.jump.description:
&7Allows to jump over obstacles to
&7get you out of a bad situation.
power-up.explosion.description:
&7Blow up the blocks near you
&7to clear your way.
power-up.teleportation.description:
&7Teleport yourself to another
&7player of the game.
power-up.new.subtitle: &7New Power-Up
power-up.teleportation.title: &f&k||&r &bTeleportation &f&k||
power-up.teleportation.subtitle: &7To %player%
